Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic and Victor Wembanyama combined for 76 points, 36 rebounds and 13 assists on Friday night
Pre-Game Insights: The Spurs are looking to take both games in the Nuggets back-to-back
The Denver Nuggets are 3.5-point favorites and ESPN Analytics Matchup Predictor gives the Nuggets a 55.6 percent chance to pull out the victory
Post-Match Reflections: The Spurs have won five of their last eight games including two in a row
A victory would move the Spurs into the upper half of the conference and provide more confidence for a young side looking to contend in the NBA
Miscellaneous Highlights: Forward Jeremy Sochan was upgraded from out to a game-time-decision
Forward Aaron Gordon is still missing for the Nuggets
Others: The game tips off at 7 p.m. CT in the Frost Bank Center
